price: Na pia mashet'ani wanao mpigia mbizi na kufanya kazi nyenginezo. Na Sisi tulikuwa walinzi wao.
arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلشَّيَٰطِينِ مَن يَغُوصُونَ لَهُۥ وَيَعۡمَلُونَ عَمَلٗا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَۖ وَكُنَّا لَهُمۡ حَٰفِظِينَ
footnotes: Na tukawafanya mashetani wamtumikie kwa kuzamia chini baharini kumletea lulu na marijani; na wakifanya kazi nyenginezo, kama kujenga ngome na majumba ya kifalme. Na Sisi tulikuwa tukiwaangalia katika kazi zao hizo, basi hapana hata mmoja wao aliye pata shida, wala hawakuvunja amri ya Suleiman.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wamina al-shayāṭīni man yaghūṣūna lahu wayaʿmalūna ʿamalan dūna dhālika wakunnā lahum ḥāfiẓīna
